name: markdown-it-icons
description: Plugin for markdown-it, supports emoji icons and font-awesome icons.

scripts.upgrade: ncu -ua && yarn upgrade && cp node_modules/emojione/assets/css/emojione-awesome.css src/ && sed -i '' 's%//cdn.jsdelivr.net/%https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/%g' src/emojione-awesome.css && cp node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.css src/ && sed -i '' 's%../fonts/%https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/fontawesome/4.7.0/fonts/%g' src/font-awesome.css

author: Tyler Long <tyler4long@gmail.com>
